verses.verse: Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> who prophesy, <S%H5012><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to those who prophesy <S%H5030><s%> from their own inspiration, <S%H3820><s%> 'Listen <S%H8085><s%> to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord! <S%H3068><s%>

'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Woe <S%H1945><s%> to the foolish <S%H5036><s%> prophets <S%H5030><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are following <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> their own spirit <S%H7307><s%> and have seen <S%H7200><s%> nothing. <S%H1115><s%>
"O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> your prophets <S%H5030><s%> have been <S%H1961><s%> like foxes <S%H7776><s%> among ruins. <S%H2723><s%>

"You have not gone <S%H5927><s%> up into the breaches, <S%H6556><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> did you build <S%H1443><s%> the wall <S%H1443><s%> around <S%H5921><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%> in the battle <S%H4421><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"They see <S%H2372><s%> falsehood <S%H7723><s%> and lying <S%H3577><s%> divination <S%H7081><s%> who are saying, <S%H559><s%> 'The Lord <S%H3068><s%> declares, <S%H5002><s%> 'when the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has not sent <S%H7971><s%> them; yet they hope <S%H3176><s%> for the fulfillment <S%H6965><s%> of [their] word. <S%H1697><s%>

"Did you not see <S%H7200><s%> a false <S%H7723><s%> vision <S%H4236><s%> and speak <S%H559><s%> a lying <S%H3577><s%> divination <S%H4738><s%> when you said, <S%H559><s%> 'The Lord <S%H3068><s%> declares, <S%H5002><s%> 'but it is not I who have spoken <S%H1696><s%>?"' "

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Because <S%H3282><s%> you have spoken <S%H1696><s%> falsehood <S%H7723><s%> and seen <S%H2372><s%> a lie, <S%H3577><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am against <S%H413><s%> you," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"So My hand <S%H3027><s%> will be against <S%H413><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> who see <S%H7200><s%> false <S%H7723><s%> visions <S%H7723><s%> and utter <S%H7080><s%> lying <S%H3577><s%> divinations. <S%H7080><s%> They will have <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> place <S%H1961><s%> in the council <S%H5475><s%> of My people, <S%H5971><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> will they be written <S%H3789><s%> down <S%H3789><s%> in the register <S%H3791><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> will they enter <S%H935><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that you may know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"It is definitely <S%H3282><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> they have misled <S%H2937><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> by saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Peace! <S%H7965><s%>' when there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> peace. <S%H7965><s%> And when anyone <S%H1931><s%> builds <S%H1129><s%> a wall, <S%H2434><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> they plaster <S%H2902><s%> it over <S%H2902><s%> with whitewash; <S%H9648><s%>

[so] tell <S%H559><s%> those who plaster <S%H2902><s%> it over <S%H2902><s%> with whitewash, <S%H9648><s%> that it will fall. <S%H5307><s%> A flooding <S%H7857><s%> rain <S%H1653><s%> will come, <S%H1961><s%> and you, O hailstones, <S%H417><s%> <S%H68><s%> will fall; <S%H5307><s%> and a violent <S%H9370><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> will break <S%H1234><s%> out.

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> when the wall <S%H7023><s%> has fallen, <S%H5307><s%> will you not be asked, <S%H559><s%> 'Where <S%H346><s%> is the plaster <S%H2915><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> you plastered <S%H2902><s%> [it]?'"

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "I will make a violent <S%H9370><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> break <S%H1234><s%> out in My wrath. <S%H2534><s%> There will also be in My anger <S%H639><s%> a flooding <S%H7857><s%> rain <S%H1653><s%> and hailstones <S%H417><s%> <S%H68><s%> to consume <S%H3615><s%> [it] in wrath. <S%H2534><s%>

"So I shall tear <S%H2040><s%> down <S%H2040><s%> the wall <S%H7023><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you plastered <S%H2902><s%> over <S%H2902><s%> with whitewash <S%H9648><s%> and bring <S%H5060><s%> it down <S%H5060><s%> to the ground, <S%H776><s%> so that its foundation <S%H3247><s%> is laid <S%H1540><s%> bare; <S%H1540><s%> and when it falls, <S%H5307><s%> you will be consumed <S%H3615><s%> in its midst. <S%H8432><s%> And you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"Thus I shall spend <S%H3615><s%> My wrath <S%H2534><s%> on the wall <S%H7023><s%> and on those who have plastered <S%H2902><s%> it over <S%H2902><s%> with whitewash; <S%H9648><s%> and I shall say <S%H559><s%> to you, 'The wall <S%H7023><s%> is gone <S%H369><s%> and its plasterers <S%H2902><s%> are gone, <S%H369><s%>

[along with] the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> who prophesy <S%H5012><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and who see <S%H7200><s%> visions <S%H2377><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> for her when there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%>' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"Now you, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%> who are prophesying <S%H5012><s%> from their own inspiration. <S%H3820><s%> Prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them,

and say, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Woe <S%H1945><s%> to the women who sew <S%H8609><s%> [magic] bands <S%H3704><s%> on all <S%H3605><s%> wrists, <S%H3027><s%> <S%H679><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> veils <S%H4555><s%> for the heads <S%H7218><s%> of [persons] of every <S%H3605><s%> stature <S%H6967><s%> to hunt <S%H6679><s%> down <S%H6679><s%> lives! <S%H5315><s%> Will you hunt <S%H6679><s%> down <S%H6679><s%> the lives <S%H5315><s%> of My people, <S%H5971><s%> but preserve <S%H2421><s%> the lives <S%H5315><s%> [of others] for yourselves?

"And for handfuls <S%H8168><s%> of barley <S%H8184><s%> and fragments <S%H9465><s%> of bread, <S%H3899><s%> you have profaned <S%H2490><s%> Me to My people <S%H5971><s%> to put <S%H4191><s%> to death <S%H4191><s%> some <S%H5315><s%> who <S%H834><s%> should not die <S%H4191><s%> and to keep <S%H2421><s%> others <S%H5315><s%> alive <S%H2421><s%> who <S%H834><s%> should not live, <S%H2421><s%> by your lying <S%H3576><s%> to My people <S%H5971><s%> who listen <S%H8085><s%> to lies. <S%H3577><s%>"' "

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am against <S%H413><s%> your [magic] bands <S%H3704><s%> by which <S%H834><s%> you hunt <S%H6679><s%> lives <S%H5315><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> as birds, <S%H9458><s%> and I will tear <S%H7167><s%> them off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> your arms; <S%H2220><s%> and I will let <S%H7971><s%> them go, <S%H7971><s%> even <S%H853><s%> those lives <S%H5315><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you hunt <S%H6679><s%> as birds. <S%H9458><s%>

"I will also tear <S%H7167><s%> off your veils <S%H4555><s%> and deliver <S%H5337><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> from your hands, <S%H3027><s%> and they will no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> be in your hands <S%H3027><s%> to be hunted; <S%H9287><s%> and you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"Because <S%H3282><s%> you disheartened <S%H3512><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> with falsehood <S%H8267><s%> when I did not cause <S%H3510><s%> him grief, <S%H3510><s%> but have encouraged <S%H2388><s%> <S%H3027><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> not to turn <S%H7725><s%> from his wicked <S%H7451><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> [and] preserve <S%H2421><s%> his life, <S%H2421><s%>

therefore, <S%H3651><s%> you women will no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> false <S%H7723><s%> visions <S%H7723><s%> or practice <S%H7080><s%> divination, <S%H7081><s%> and I will deliver <S%H5337><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> out of your hand. <S%H3027><s%> Thus you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> "
